sentences.en: a course in applied linguistics
sentences.cn: 应用语言学课程

sentences.en: At one stroke he swept from linguistics all the apparatus of introspectionist psychology .
sentences.cn: 他一举扫除了语言学中所有内省心理学内容的影响。

sentences.en: At one stroke he swept from linguistics all the apparatus of introspectionist psychology.
sentences.cn: 他一举扫除了语言学中所有内省心理学内容的影响.

sentences.en: He has an MA in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 他有语言学硕士学位.

sentences.en: He is a prominent scholar in the field of linguistics.
sentences.cn: 他是语言学领域的杰出学者.

sentences.en: He is distinguished for his knowledge of linguistics.
sentences.cn: 他因语言学的知识而著名((他对语言学的造诣深厚)).

sentences.en: It took three hours for the doctor of linguistics to tell us this. Again I quit.
sentences.cn: 关于这一点，这个语言学博士足足讲了三个小时，我再次退出了。

sentences.en: Linguistics can be defined as the science of language.
sentences.cn: 语言学是研究语言的科学.

sentences.en: Linguistics is a scientific study of the property of language.
sentences.cn: 语言学是指对语言的性质所作的系统研究.

sentences.en: Literary studies have been cross - fertilized by new ideas in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 文学研究从语言学方面的新见解中受益良多.

sentences.en: Out with every theory of human behavior, from linguistics to sociology.
sentences.cn: 从语言学、社会学的人类行为原理里解脱吧。

sentences.en: She is a prominent scholar in the field of linguistics.
sentences.cn: 她是语言学领域的杰出学者.

sentences.en: The research should prove invaluable in the study of linguistics.
sentences.cn: 该调查研究在语言学研究领域的重要性应该会得到证实。

sentences.en: The school offers two modules in Teaching English as a Foreign Language, viz. Principles and Methods of Language Teaching and Applied Linguistics.
sentences.cn: 该校“作为外语的英语教学”有两个模块：即语言教学的原则与方法和应用语言学。

sentences.en: The secretary had diplomas in both education and linguistics.
sentences.cn: 秘书取得了教育学和语言学的两种毕业文凭. (毕业证书)

sentences.en: The study of language as a whole is often called general linguistics.
sentences.cn: 作为整体而言的语言研究经常被成为普通语言学.

sentences.en: Then we have research center in Grenoble, France where the focus is all on linguistics, machine learning.
sentences.cn: 我们在法国格勒诺布尔也有研究中心,研究重点是语言学和机器学习。

sentences.en: These ideas rapidly became the new orthodoxy in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 这些观点迅速成为语言学中新的正统观念。

sentences.en: What do you mean by linguistics?
sentences.cn: 你说的语言学是什么意思？

sentences.en: What is both the integral and concrete object of linguistics?
sentences.cn: 语言学的又完整又具体的对象是什么 呢 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 应用语言学；运用语言学

trans.tran_cn: 语言学，语言的，语言学的，语言研究的( linguistic的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: the study of language in general and of particular languages, their structure, grammar, and history
